title: Sound search can't identify music that's playing from the phone (after recent updates)
content:
After some recent updates the Sound Search homescreen widget (from the google application) can no longer identify a song that's playing from the phone, such as from a podcast or an internet radio station.It worked great until recently.

Now when I press Sound Search the music pauses and the song can't be identified. The now playing feature never worked very well and can only identify a small fraction of the music that Sound Search can.

Is there a setting somewhere to prevent the music audio from ducking or pausing when I hit Sound Search?
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 3a
